Krisztián Hofstädter

if only

A music release featuring compositions reflecting on the idea of freedom and a remix of Karl Lauefer's house track 'Mondillo De Fujer'.

time: Jan 2009

tags: music, music-release, remix

The piece ‘if only’ was submitted as an assignment for Gareth Stuart’s module Studio Recordings, ‘Japanese Whales’ was a reflection on fishing and the remix for Karl is an experimentation with different rhythms.

credits: Chanting on ‘if only’ by Simon Lowes
tools: Logic, Rob Papen’s Predator and Waldorf Blofeld
